feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
